name: Picky Font
description:
Sure, the default font picker is ok... but have you dreamed about a faster, better way to preview, sort, choose, try out, compare, and bookmark fonts? I know I did... well, dream no further! Try the Picky Font plugin today and become a Picky Fonter!


Features

  • Ultra-fast dynamic text preview to preview all your fonts at a glance
  • Search and bookmark filter for quick access and side-by-side comparisons
  • Instantly change any font with a single click in Picky Font


Pricing

  • Free for 2 uses per document (No commitment, no sign-up necessary and use right away!)
  • If you like it, $10 (USD) for a lifetime license (limited to the first 100 customers, thanks for your support!) (payment through Gumroad for activation key)
